xml.data:
Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.4 Ariyamaggavagga
4.4.4 Sappurisadhammasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Ariyamaggavagga
Sappurisadhammasutta
192.
1364“Sappurisadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asappurisadhammañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
1365Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo”ti.
1366Catutthaṃ.
